hero.title: Invest in real estate
hero.subtitle: in a fractional and transparent way
hero.description: Parse City transforms real estate into blockchain tokens. Buy building shares, generate passive income, and trade your assets freely.

step1.title: 1. Get USDC
step1.description: Click the Faucet button to receive 1000 test USDC for free

step2.title: 2. Explore the city
step2.description: Click on a building in the 3D view to see details and performance

step3.title: 3. Buy shares
step3.description: Approve USDC then buy as many shares as you want

step4.title: 4. Generate income
step4.description: Automatically receive yields based on your investments

fractional.title: Fractional Ownership
fractional.description: Invest from 100 USDC instead of hundreds of thousands of euros

transparent.title: 100% Transparent
transparent.description: All transactions are verifiable on Avalanche blockchain

ai.title: AI Analysis
ai.description: Receive PLU alerts and real-time risk analysis

dashboard.noInvestments: You don't have any investments yet

Hero.description: Don't just invest. Manage your real estate empire in 3D on the blockchain. Simple, secure, and accessible from $50.
